thread.title: Sharyl Attkisson ready to rock political talk

author: wn.com
title: Sharyl Attkisson ready to rock political talk
text: SHARYL ATTKISSON READY TO ROCK POLITICAL TALK This could jolt the chatty Sunday talk show realm: The investigators have arrived. " Full Measure with Sharyl Attkisson " debuts this weekend, focusing on investigative journalism and authentic accountability rather than sound bites and talking points, its creators say. "We will pierce secrecy and ... ...
